name: Nexster
description:
Game is hosted on - https://rishabh-malik.github.io/Game-Hack-IIITD/
Nexster is a 3D space game which detects emotions of players and converts it into a feedback for controlling the pace of the game. Your emotions while playing the game helps to modify the speed and pace of the game. 
Nexster facilitates the multiplayer mode where players can play in a joint room and results and achievements are displayed at the end of the game.
Team GH-34Team Members: Rishabh Malik, Mukul Goyal, Siddhant Singh Rathore, Chetan Sobti
